definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
to entrust (to sb)/to place (one's hope, energy etc) in/a thing in which you invest (your hope, energy etc)
to place (hope, importance etc) on/to express/to show/to give
to place in the care of sb (a child, pet etc)/to foster/to board out
to live in or on another organism as a parasite/to live by taking advantage of others/parasitism/parasitic
to deposit/to store/to leave sth with sb
to lodge under another person's roof (idiom); to live relying on sb else's charity

sentences.english: If it's urgent. We can send it by express.
sentences.chinese: 如果是急件，我们可以寄快件。

sentences.english: Martin recollected his blank-verse tragedy, and sent it instead.
sentences.chinese: 马丁想起了他的素体诗悲剧，便把它寄去充数。

sentences.english: Mama Sinatra has promised to send the recipes.
sentences.chinese: 辛纳屈的妈妈答应寄来菜谱。

sentences.english: Remind dme to post that letter.
Your cooperate is returning the enclosed form promptly would be much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 我公司将非常感谢贵方早日寄回信内所附的表格。

sentences.english: It's one of the woodcarvings sent from Nepal by my bother.
sentences.chinese: 弟从尼泊尔寄回来的其中一个木雕。

sentences.english: Goat sister sent a letter, bleating.
Jiang Mou uses civilian battalion express delivery in Nanning, sent cogged material to Liang Mou.
sentences.chinese: 蒋某则在南宁用民营快递，给梁某寄去了作弊器材。

sentences.english: Please send us a pattern - book and quote the lowest price for sateen .
sentences.chinese: 请寄横贡缎样品簿和最优惠报价单。

sentences.english: He replied to Hogan and sent him a plot of the noise.
sentences.chinese: 他回信给霍根并寄去一段噪音的曲线图。

sentences.english: How much does it cost to send a letter to Hong Kong by airmail?
sentences.chinese: 寄航空信到香港要多少钱？

sentences.english: I sent payment by registered airmail 5 days ago.
sentences.chinese: 我5天前用航空挂号把款寄去了。

sentences.english: Could you send me some of your photos?
sentences.chinese: 给我寄几张你的照片，好吗？

sentences.english: Please write down the date and time of posting on the present lable.
sentences.chinese: 请在特快专递详单上写上交寄邮件的日期和时间。

sentences.english: Send it second- class if it is not urgent.
sentences.chinese: 如不急的话，就按二等邮件寄。

sentences.english: She sent him a letter of apology.
sentences.chinese: 她给他寄了一封道歉信。

definition: to buy or sell on credit/distant/long (time)/to forgive
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
seeing an object makes one miss its owner (idiom)
to put down the pen/to stop writing
a departing gift/a souvenir on leaving/a poem to mark one's departure
to stay for a long period
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
late at night/in the dead of night
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
